text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia tricolor is a species in the genus Tillandsia. This species is native to Central America (Costa Rica, Panama, Guatemala, Nicaragua, Honduras) and Mexico (Veracruz, Oaxaca, Chiapas).
text.Cultivars:
Tillandsia 'Cootharaba'
Tillandsia 'Corella'
Tillandsia 'Ervin Wurthmann'
Tillandsia 'Nashville'
Tillandsia 'Oeseriana'
Tillandsia 'Purple Passion'
Tillandsia 'Silver Bullets'
Tillandsia 'Wolvi'
